H0.text: when did united states enter world war i. June 1916

H1.text: when did united states enter world war i. November 1918

H2.text: when did united states enter world war i. January 1915

H3.text: when did united states enter world war i. April 1917

A4.text: The United States entered into World War I on 6 April 1917, more than two and a half years after the war began in Europe.

A5.text: Congress voted to declare war on Germany on April 6, 1917, and Wilson signed it the following afternoon.
